title: OPPO partners with Hasselblad to enhance the imaging capabilities of its upcoming flagships
content:
In the weeks leading up to the OnePlus 9 series launch last year, OnePlus confirmed that it had entered a three-year partnership with Swedish camera maker Hasselblad to improve the imaging capabilities of its devices. The OnePlus 9 series was the first smartphone lineup from the company to bear the fruits of this partnership, and

The post OPPO partners with Hasselblad to enhance the imaging capabilities of its upcoming flagships appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Following in OnePlus' footsteps, OPPO has now announced a partnership with Hasselblad to enhance the imaging capabilities of its upcoming flagships.
